channel.title: What happens if you have a non-reaper ally in a reaper mission?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "What happens if you have a non-reaper ally in a reaper mission?"

item.title: Re: What happens if you have a non-reaper ally in a reaper mission?
Re: What happens if you have a non-reaper ally in a reaper mission?
item.content:encoded: He just leaves your party. You don't have to go find him again.

item.title: What happens if you have a non-reaper ally in a reaper mission?
item.content:encoded:
(WARNING: Only Reaper and Innate abilities may be used here!): Billy will leave your party if you attempt this!

Does this mean he just gets taken out of my party or that I have to go find him again because I lose him as an ally? I forgot to remove his butt from my party and I really don't wanna spend the stamina to do it manually.
